QuestData.Title: Sacrifices Must be Made
QuestData.Description: I've got it, mon!$b$bTo da north, on da Ziggurat at Zeb'Halak be a stone head with ruby eyes. One o' dem be da Eye of the Prophets! Bring it to the brazier there and drink my elixir.$b$bAgain, ya be needing some mojo for my elixir to work - dis time from da warlord, Zim'bo. He be hidin' in one of da huts in Zeb'Halak.$b$bIt be a shame to kill Zim'bo, mon, but he swore da blood oath to defend Drak'Tharon and he done failed. Now at least his mojo be helpin' us to reclaim Drak'Tharon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru wants you to bring the Eye of the Prophets to him at Drakuru's Brazier in Zeb'Halak.$b$bYou will need to collect Zim'bo's Mojo to use Drakuru's Elixir there.
QuestData.CompletionText: You get da Eye of the Prophets, mon?
QuestData.RewardText: Dis be it, mon!$b$bIt be even more precious than I hoped. Dis be sure to bring mah people hope in dese dark times.$b$bNo time to waste, now. Let's be seein' where da next artifact be hidin'.
